verses.verse: So the king <S%H4428><s%> and Haman <S%H2001><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to banquet <S%H8354><s%> with Esther <S%H635><s%> the queen. <S%H4436><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> again to Esther <S%H635><s%> on the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> at the banquet <S%H4960><s%> of wine, <S%H3196><s%> "What is your petition, <S%H7596><s%> queen <S%H4436><s%> Esther? <S%H635><s%> It shall be granted <S%H5414><s%> you. <S%H1246><s%> What is your request? Even to the half <S%H2677><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> it shall be performed. <S%H6213><s%>"

Then Esther <S%H635><s%> the queen <S%H4436><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> "If <S%H559><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> O king, <S%H4428><s%> and if it please <S%H2895><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> let my life <S%H5315><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> me at my petition, <S%H7596><s%> and my people <S%H5971><s%> at my request. <S%H1246><s%>

For we are sold, <S%H4376><s%> I and my people, <S%H5971><s%> to be destroyed, <S%H8045><s%> to be slain, <S%H2026><s%> and to perish. <S%H6><s%> But if <S%H432><s%> we had been sold <S%H4376><s%> for bondservants <S%H5650><s%> and bondmaids, <S%H8198><s%> I would have held my peace, <S%H2790><s%> although the adversary <S%H6862><s%> could not have compensated <S%H7737><s%> for the king <S%H4428><s%>'s loss. <S%H5143><s%>"

Then King <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Esther <S%H635><s%> the queen, <S%H4436><s%> "Who is he, <S%H4390><s%> and where is he who dared presume in his heart <S%H3820><s%> to do so? <S%H6213><s%>"

Esther <S%H635><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "An adversary <S%H376><s%> and an enemy, <S%H341><s%> even this wicked <S%H7451><s%> Haman! <S%H2001><s%>" Then Haman <S%H2001><s%> was afraid <S%H1204><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> and the queen. <S%H4436><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> in his wrath <S%H2534><s%> from the banquet <S%H4960><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> and went into the palace <S%H1055><s%> garden. <S%H1594><s%> Haman <S%H2001><s%> stood up <S%H5975><s%> to make request <S%H1245><s%> for his life <S%H5315><s%> to Esther <S%H635><s%> the queen; <S%H4436><s%> for he saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was evil <S%H7451><s%> determined <S%H3615><s%> against him by the king. <S%H4428><s%>

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> out of the palace <S%H1055><s%> garden <S%H1594><s%> into the place <S%H1004><s%> of the banquet <S%H4960><s%> of wine; <S%H3196><s%> and Haman <S%H2001><s%> had fallen <S%H5307><s%> on the couch <S%H4296><s%> where Esther <S%H635><s%> was. <S%H4428><s%> Then the king said, <S%H559><s%> "Will he even assault <S%H3533><s%> the queen <S%H4436><s%> in front of me in the house? <S%H1004><s%>" As the word <S%H1697><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s mouth, <S%H6310><s%> they covered <S%H2645><s%> Haman <S%H2001><s%>'s face. <S%H6440><s%>

Then Harbonah, <S%H2726><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> who were with <S%H6440><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H6086><s%> the gallows fifty <S%H2572><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> high, <S%H1364><s%> which Haman <S%H2001><s%> has made <S%H6213><s%> for Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> who spoke <S%H1696><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> for the king, <S%H4428><s%> is standing <S%H5975><s%> at Haman <S%H2001><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>" The king <S%H4428><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Hang him on it! <S%H8518><s%>"

So they hanged <S%H8518><s%> Haman <S%H2001><s%> on the gallows <S%H6086><s%> that he had prepared <S%H3559><s%> for Mordecai. <S%H4782><s%> Then was the king <S%H4428><s%>'s wrath <S%H2534><s%> pacified. <S%H7918><s%>
